# this is the build file for project 
# it is autogenerated by the xmake build system.
# do not edit by hand.

# project
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.15.0)
cmake_policy(SET CMP0091 NEW)
project(SqlPool LANGUAGES CXX C)

# target
add_executable(SqlPool "")
set_target_properties(SqlPool PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME "SqlPool")
set_target_properties(SqlPool PROPERTIES RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/linux/x86_64/release")
target_include_directories(SqlPool PRIVATE
    /usr/include/mysql
    /usr/include/mysql/mysql
)
target_include_directories(SqlPool PRIVATE
    /usr/local/include
)
target_compile_options(SqlPool PRIVATE
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-m64>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-m64>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-DNDEBUG>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-DNDEBUG>
)
if(MSVC)
    target_compile_options(SqlPool PRIVATE $<$<CONFIG:Release>:-Ox -fp:fast>)
else()
    target_compile_options(SqlPool PRIVATE -O3)
endif()
if(MSVC)
else()
    target_compile_options(SqlPool PRIVATE -fvisibility=hidden)
endif()
if(MSVC)
    set_property(TARGET SqlPool PROPERTY
        MSVC_RUNTIME_LIBRARY "MultiThreaded$<$<CONFIG:Debug>:Debug>")
endif()
target_link_libraries(SqlPool PRIVATE
    jsoncpp
    fmt
)
target_link_directories(SqlPool PRIVATE
    /usr/local/lib64
)
target_link_options(SqlPool PRIVATE
    -m64
    -L/usr/lib64/
    -lmariadb
)
target_sources(SqlPool PRIVATE
    src/ConnectionPool.cpp
    src/MysqlCon.cpp
    src/main.cpp
)
